posts.postText: Add me on steam for our TF2 Tournament. We have a skirmish tomorrow. I need yo response.
I just learned im doing weekend shifts for work. Hence I think I'll just be dropping the tourney. Sorry mang.
FUUUUUUUUH. Well if anyone here can take quacks spot, lemme know.
What class do you need replaced?

Prolly soldier/medic.

Idk if Mongo will respond so uhh. Anyone that gets here before 12:30 EST is in the skirmish today.
Don't you need to register or something?
no. Its not til octobe 10th, we are skirmishing
